mdRecord.dcterms:title: Epperly Cemetery, Courthouse Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located adjacent to 326 Spring Dale Rd. SW in a fenced enclosure 100 yards to the right of Spring Dale Rd. and 600 yards from the intersection of Parkway Lane and Spring Dale Rd. Visible from Google Earth and Google Maps. It is recommended that you get permission from the property owner before visiting, N 36 51.372' W080 19.640'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
